All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main class.
Area
Representation of an area object.
CreditCardValidation
Logic for credit card validation.
Direction
Represents the 16 different compass directions the drone can face.
InvalidCardNoException
Exception used when the credit card number is invalid.
InvalidCreditCardExpiryException
Exception used when the expiry date of a credit card is invalid
InvalidCvvException
Exception used when the cvv number of a credit card is invalid.
InvalidPizzaCombinationException
Exception used when the ordered pizza combination cannot be delivered by the same restaurant.
InvalidPizzaCountException
Exception used when the ordered number of pizzas is invalid.
InvalidPizzaNotDefinedException
Exception used when at least one of the ordered pizzas is invalid
LineSegment
Representation of a line segment.
LngLat
Representation of the point on a 2D plane.
Menu
Represents one menu entry of a restaurant.
Move
Representation of one move of a drone.
MoveLimitReachedException
Exception used when the drone battery is exhausted
Navigator
Logic for drone navigation.
Order
Represents the order of a customer.
OrderOutcome
Represents the outcome of an order
OrderProcessor
Logic for processing the orders for the given day.
Output
Contains the methods for generating output.
Restaurant
Represents a restaurant that can provide pizzas to the PizzaDronz service.
RestClient
Class for retrieving data from the Rest server.
VisibilityGraph
Graph representation of the no-fly zone vertices and start/end points.
